channel.title: Personal on David John Baker
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on David John Baker

item.title: A Brief Summary of My Career in the UK and Europe
item.description: I spent the last six years (mostly) working as an academic in the UK and Europe researching questions at the overlap of music and science.

item.title: Summer Break 2023 Reflections
item.description: Today marks the end of my summer holidays (for the most part).

item.title: A Decade of Music and Science
item.description: A few days ago Amy Belfi pointed out it’s been ten years since we met.

item.title: A Peculiar Anniversary
item.description: Today marks a peculiar anniversary. As of the 2nd of February, for the first time in my life, I have been at the same job for more than a year.

item.title: Website Makeover
item.description: After a few months of not blogging, Iâ€™m hoping to return to writing with a bit more regularity.
